name: motherearthradio
description: Mother Earth Radio - High Resolution Radio
author: Florian Reiterer

volumio_info.details: Mother Earth Radio is a free HD music station without advertising. Best audio quality, selected tracks, audiophile only. Stream now!
volumio_info.changelog: 1.5.0 Added FLAC 192kHz Mono streams (server-side -3dB professional mix) for reduced listening effort. Fixed SSE connection leak.
